mapper.select: SELECT bvr.id as verdictRecordId, inviter_user_id as inviterUserId, (select user_name from biz_user u where bvr.inviter_user_id = u.id) as inviterUserName, bvr.first_user_id as firstUserId, bvr.first_commander_user_id as firstCommanderUserId, bvr.first_judge_user_id as firstJudgeUserId, (select user_name from biz_user u where bvr.first_user_id = u.id) as firstUserName, (select user_name from biz_user u where bvr.first_judge_user_id = u.id) as firstJudgeUserName, (select user_name from biz_user u where bvr.first_commander_user_id = u.id) as firstCommanderUserName, bvr.first_camp_id as firstCampId, (select name from biz_chess_pieces_camp cpc where cpc.id = bvr.first_camp_id) as firstCampName, bvr.second_user_id as secondUserId, bvr.second_judge_user_id as secondJudgeUserId, bvr.second_commander_user_id as secondCommanderUserId, (select user_name from biz_user u where bvr.second_user_id = u.id) as secondUserName, (select user_name from biz_user u where bvr.second_judge_user_id = u.id) as secondJudgeUserName, (select user_name from biz_user u where bvr.second_commander_user_id = u.id) as secondCommanderUserName, bvr.second_camp_id as secondCampId, (select name from biz_chess_pieces_camp cpc where cpc.id = bvr.second_camp_id) as secondCampName, bvr.scenario_id as scenarioId, s.scenario_name as scenarioName, bvr.invite_code as invite_code, bvr.watch_mode as watchMode, bvr.status, bvr.chess_round as chessRound, bvr.chess_round_limit as chessRoundLimit, p.cover as cover, bvr.del_flag as del_flag, bvr.create_time as create_time FROM `biz_verdict_record` bvr left join biz_scenario_create s on s.id = bvr.scenario_id left join biz_product p on p.id = s.product_id ${ew.getCustomSqlSegment}
